name: @nivinjoseph/n-data
description: Data access library for Postgres based on Knex

scripts.ts-build: npm run ts-compile && npm run ts-lint
scripts.setup-db-server: docker run --name test-postgres -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=p@ssw0rd -d postgres:10.5 && sleep 5
scripts.setup-db: docker run -it --rm -e PGPASSWORD=p@ssw0rd postgres:10.5 psql -h 172.17.0.1 -U postgres -c 'create database testdb;'
scripts.pretest: npm run ts-build && npm run setup-db-server && npm run setup-db
scripts.posttest: docker stop test-postgres && docker rm test-postgres
scripts.publish-package: npm run ts-build-dist && git add . && git commit -m 'preparing to publish new version' && npm version patch && git push && npm publish --access=public

author: NiviN
